author: cframpton
msg: Fix up tolerances for drag in progress tests (mac).

author: breser
msg: irkerbridge: Adjust the handling of log_firstline to deal the client decoding.
(fill_in_extra_args): Look for a literal new lines.  Add log_firstparagraph,
which should make it easier to print just the summary piece of the commit

author: chenpei
msg: - Added unique qualified names to TypeSystems such as org.apache.ctakes.typesystem.types.TypeSystem.
And reference them in imports via name instead of locations such as ../.. or ../../.. etc.
- Move Type System Descriptors to src/main/resources and have them automatically added to the classpath via maven.
- Made Type Systems auto detectable for uimaFIT via META-INF/org.uimafit/types.txt

author: mduerig
msg: - use static factory instead of instance constructor
